info.+content: Pichi Pichi Pitch - La Mélodie des Sirènes
マーメイドメロディー ぴちぴちピッチ
マーメイドメロディーぴちぴちピッチピュア

As the mermaid princess of the North Pacific (one of the seven mermaid kingdoms), Lucia entrusts a magical pearl to a boy who falls overboard a ship one night. Lucia must travel to the human world to reclaim her pearl and protect the mermaid kingdoms. Using the power of music Lucia is able to protect herself and the mermaid kingdoms from a growing evil force.
#1: "Taiyou no Rakuen ~Promised Land~" by Miyuki Kanbe (eps 1-)
#2: "Sekai de Ichiban Hayaku Asa ga Kuru Basho" by A. Nakata, H. Terakado, and M. Asano (eps 27-52)
#3: "Ai no Ondo" by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado, and Mayumi Asano (eps 53-91)
"Ankoku no Tsubasa" (暗黒の翼) by Sanae Kobayashi

"Hana to Chou no Serenade" (花と蝶のセレナーデ) by Megumi Kojima
"Kibou no Kaneoto ~Love goes on~" (希望の鐘音 〜Love goes on〜) by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado, Mayumi Asano, Ema Kogure, Satomi Arai, Ryoko Nagata and Eri Kitamura
"Kizuna" by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado, and Mayumi Asano
"Kodou ~Perfect Harmony~" by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado, Mayumi Asano, Ema Kogure, Satomi Arai, Ryoko Nagata and Kana Ueda
"Koi wa Nandarō" (恋はなんだろう) by Asumi Nakata
"Kuro no Kyōsōkyoku ~concerto~" (黒の協奏曲 ～concerto～) by Miki Tsuchiya and Noriko Shitaya
"Legend of Mermaid" by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado and Mayumi Asano
"Mizuiro no Senritsu" (水色の旋律) by Hitomi Terakado
"Mother Symphony" by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado, and Mayumi Asano
"Nanatsu no Umi no Monogatari ~Pearls of Mermaid~" (七つの海の物語 ～Pearls of Mermaid～) by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado, and Mayumi Asano
"Return to the Sea" by Kana Ueda
"Star MeroMero Heart" (Star☆メロメロ Heart) by Masayo Kurata
"Super Love Songs!" by Asumi Nakata, Hitomi Terakado, and Mayumi Asano
"Tsubasa wo Daite" (翼を抱いて) by Junko Minagawa
"Yami no Baroque" (闇のBAROQUE -バロック-) by Miki Tsuchiya and Noriko Shitaya
